page.title: 19The Vet in Penicuik
page.content: { Mrs Young, the vet in Penicuik There are nearly{600 animal patients, mainly{dogs, cats, guinea pigs}but Mrs Young also treats{cows, sheep and {riding ponies.}The surgery is open from 9.15 to 10.15 in the morning, and from 6.00 to 6.45 in the evening. There are{2 vets with 3 assistants. They treat between 6 and 18 animals every day and perform 5 to 10 operations. We saw the{operating table with the{anaesthetic machine}and the {x-ray table with a pair of lead-lined {gloves and apron.}We saw a special cage to deal with frightened cats and also an x-ray of a rabbit's skull and some instruments which Mrs Young uses.
